issue.title: [C++] Do not build unit tests by default in build system
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3988](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3988). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is partly an RFC: given that many people are building the C++ library in order to develop or test other parts of Apache Arrow, it might make sense to opt-in to building the unit tests rather than opting out. There are additional system requirements to build the unit tests, such as a newer version of CMake

`[~kou]` suggested this originally here

https://github.com/apache/arrow/issues/3140#issuecomment-445694144

In principle I'm in favor of this
